reviewText: First of all let me tell you that the UNRATED VERSION is called Erotic Boundaries. If you see it just called "Boundaries" it is RATED and EDITED!All the sex is cut out of the Rated version. DON'T GET THIS VERSION!The unrated,unedited version can be found on Dvd for around 30 bucks,that's right 30 Bucks! But there is a catch,it is the PAL version of the movie and you will need an all region Dvd player to watch it. These all region Dvd players can be found for cheap right here on Amazon and they are great for movie lovers. There are tons of movies just like "Erotic Boundaries" that are no longer available on Dvd in the USA but are very easy to find UNCUT in PAL format brand new. Now that all of that has been said i will tell you about the plot. Kathy Shower plays the role of a woman that works in an office,when she comes home her husband isn't in the mood to have hot steamy sex with her so she finds it elsewhere. One day she bumps into one of her girlfriends that she hasn't seen in years,this woman turns out to be very kinky and with the help of her boyfriend they try to bring out the wildside of Kathy. Throughout the movie Kathy gets into many sexy situations and things just get hotter and hotter! If you like softcore porn than this is a must see.
Not a bad movie--got to find the unrated version-acting is not bad for a B movie--this needs to be on DVD--anyone out there have the Unrated version???

This is a very hot film. A true Erotic Thriller in the real sense of the word containing both eroticism and a sense of thrill and both mixed together adequately enough to keep any trigger happy finger away from the Fast Forward button. The star of the film is Kathy Shower, a bored housewife who inadvertently gets caught up in sordid sex club co-run by an old college friend with whom she had a brief lesbian fling some years previously. It's not long before Kathy is sucked into this exciting but dangerous world. The scenes, as I said above, are very hot and we see a clear departure for Kathy into the world of near  softcore adult film as opposed to the more easy going L.A Goddess type movies which although sexy where also timid in comparison to this film. If you're looking for Kathy in the flesh then you can do no better (for now) than Boundaries, Kathy having about 5 decent scenes (I refer to the same priced unrated version also available though Amazon). The rated version has about 3.5 of Kathy's scenes but is still a worthy addition to any video collection...Why not!
Keth.
p.s - Briefly titled 'Erotic Boundaries' for a short time.
